Articles.Content:
Karas the new class of interplanetary ship is now available.

Paired with 'Kiku\'s high-payload launch system' The Karas ship gets into orbit and on it\'s way with 90%+ fuel in it\'s tanks (due in part to not firing until maneuvering into orbit)

100% stock components

PROS

easily modified to your mission needs

High maneuverability

Reliable

CONS

Don\'t leave SAS and RCS on at same time (you\'ll run out of fuel in no time)

Requires further testing to gather all the bugs

this video (once processed, shows launch into a 300km orbit)
Is the craft file going to be made available?
